about_the_game:
Discover the essence of The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak II through this carefully-curated mini art book.

This special 16-page collection focuses on the key characters whose fates intertwine in the Calvard Republic. Explore the beautifully illustrated profiles of many central figures: from the underground problem solver Van and the academy student Agnès, to former assassins Swin and Nadia, the noble bracer Elaine, and the mysterious exchange student Renne.

The book concludes with exclusive artwork originally created as store-specific bonuses in Japan. Don't miss this perfect compact companion for deeping your appreciation of this rich narrative universe!

content_descriptors.notes:
Rare occurrences of violence against bound hostages.
Discrimination against fictional minorities.
Usage of Fantasy Drugs.
Insinuation of child prostitution.
Depiction of Suicide
